nodes.bodyText:
I am not sure why we need this?
I agree that SelectAuthenticatorPage will need to be rewritten once KEYCLOAK-12469 is resolved, however the selecting authentication mechanism should already work in latest master as well - after selecting the mechanism in the combobox, there is some JS call triggered that should automatically redirect you to the page with the selected authentication mechanism. If it doesn't work, it might be a regression of this PR or it may have some other cause...
I think we should fix the tests even when this Assume is removed. In general, using Assume is quite dangerous as it makes certain tests in-fact disabled, so I will rather not use it at all on places like this...
I'm sorry. I've caused the problem. "Assume" block is removed. The problem was with the nested header tag in template.ftl.
